remarks: Axiom of Quantifier Commutation.  This axiom says universal quantifiers can be swapped.  Axiom scheme C6' in [Megill] p. 448 (p. 16 of the preprint).  Also appears as Lemma 12 of [Monk2] p. 109 and Axiom C5-3 of [Monk2] p. 113.  This axiom scheme is logically redundant (see ~ ax11w ) but is used as an auxiliary axiom to achieve metalogical completeness. (Contributed by NM, 12-Mar-1993.)
statement: ax-11 $p |- ( A. x A. y ph -> A. y A. x ph ) $.
